					<div class="row pagin-north"><div class="col-xs-6"><a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/comiclist-new-comic-book-releases-list-for-05-08-2019-csv" title="Permanent link to full entry">&laquo; ComicList: New Comic Book Releases List for 05/08/2019 (CSV)</a></div><div class="col-xs-6"><a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/comiclist-marvel-comics-new-releases-for-05-08-2019" title="Permanent link to full entry">ComicList: Marvel Comics New Releases for 05/08/2019 &raquo;</a></div></div>						<div class="post-wrapper published"  lang="en-US">
							<h1>ComicList: New Comic Book Releases List for 05/08/2019</h1>							<div class="post-header">
								 May 6th, 2019 8:21pm by <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/?disp=user&amp;user_ID=1">ComicList</a> <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/?disp=msgform&amp;post_id=42678&amp;recipient_id=1&amp;redirect_to=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.comiclist.com%2Findex.php%2Flists%2F%3Fdisp%3Dmsgform%26post_id%3D42678%26recipient_id%3D1" title="Send email to post author" rel="nofollow"><img src="http://www.comiclist.com/rsc/icons/envelope.gif" border="0" align="top" width="13" height="10"  class="middle" title="Send email to post author" alt="Email"/></a> 							</div><!-- /post-header -->
							<div class="post-content">
								<p><a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878042959"><img src="//d2lzb5v10mb0lj.cloudfront.net/covers_tfaw/400/MA/MAR190496.jpg" title="Batman Who Laughs #5 (Of 7)(Cover B Viktor Kalvachev)" style="float:right;margin-left:10px;border:none;width:200px;" /></a><strong>ComicList: New Comic Book Releases List for Wednesday, May 8, 2019.</strong>, a list of the comic books, graphic novels, and other products that should be available at your local or online comic book shop this week.</p>
<a id="more42678" name="more42678"></a>
<p>This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States License, and is &copy; 1995-2019 Charles S. LePage.</p>

<p>This information is compiled from a variety of sources including Diamond Distribution and our friends at <a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?B=44882&amp;U=167587&amp;M=8908">Things From Another World</a> and <a href="http://comics.gocollect.com">GoCollect</a>.  Visit <a href="http://comics.gocollect.com">GoCollect</a> and use their next-generation, near real-time <a href="http://comics.gocollect.com">comic book price guide</a>.  To find a local comic book shop, please browse <a href="http://www.the-master-list.com/index.shtml">The Master List of Comic Book &amp; Trading Card Stores</a>.  Join us on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/ComicList/6269593037" target="_blank">Facebook</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/ComicList">Twitter</a> for discussions about your favorite comics.</p>

<p>PLEASE NOTE- Not all of these titles will arrive in all stores. Let me know if any of the names or numbers are wrong.  Items with release dates not verified by Diamond Distribution are individually noted.</p>

<p>Scroll down for "mature" items on page 2.</p>

<p><b><u>PUBLISHER</u></b><br />
TITLE, ISSUE NUMBER, PRICE IN U.S. DOLLARS ("AR" means "ask your retailer for the price")</p>

<p><b><u>AARDVARK VANAHEIM</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878042532">Cerebus Woman #1</a>, $4.00 </p>

<p><b><u>ABBEVILLE PRESS</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878042531">My Adventures As An Illustrator The Definitive Edition HC</a>, $40.00</p>

<p><b><u>AFTERSHOCK COMICS</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=875393482">Beyonders Volume 1 TP</a>, $14.99<br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Comics/Profile/Last%2BSpace%2BRace%2B%2525234___587986%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">Last Space Race #4</a>, $3.99<br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878043290">Oberon #4</a>, $3.99</p>

<p><b><u>AHOY COMICS</u></b><br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Comics/Profile/Bronze%2BAge%2BBoogie%2B%2525232___598225%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">Bronze Age Boogie #2</a>, $3.99 </p>

<p><b><u>ALTERNA COMICS</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=866961730">Exilium #5 (Of 6)</a>, $1.50<br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=866962713">ICYMI #4</a>, $0.99<br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Comics/Profile/It%2BCame%2BOut%2Bon%2Ba%2BWednesday%2B%2525236___596373%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">It Came Out On A Wednesday #6</a>, $1.99<br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=866962730">Midnight Mystery #4 (Of 4)</a>, $1.50<br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=866962729">Mighty Mascots #1 (Of 3)</a>, $1.50</p>

<p><b><u>AMERICAN MYTHOLOGY PRODUCTIONS</u></b><br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Comics/Profile/Am%2BArchives%2BMark%2Bof%2BZorro%2B1949%2B1st%2BApp%2B%2525231%2BMain%2BCover___597827%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">AM Archives The Mark Of Zorro 1949 1st Appearance #1 (Cover A Bill Ely)</a>, $3.99 <br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Comics/Profile/Am%2BArchives%2BMark%2Bof%2BZorro%2B1949%2B1st%2BApp%2B%2525231%2BLtd%2BEd%2BCover___597826%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">AM Archives The Mark Of Zorro 1949 1st Appearance #1 (Cover B Robert Rigot)</a>, $3.99 <br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878042478">Three Stooges Astro Nuts #1 (Cover A Eric Shanower Cheese Variant)</a>, $3.99 <br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878042477">Three Stooges Astro Nuts #1 (Cover B Photo)</a>, $3.99 <br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=878042476">Three Stooges Astro Nuts #1 (Cover C Black &amp; White Photo)</a>, $9.99 </p>

<p><b><u>AMIGO COMICS</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850690387">Druid's Path #1 (One Shot)</a>, $9.99 <br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Graphic+Novels/Profile/Pico%2BPico%2BAdventures%2BGN___593278%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">Pico Pico Adventures GN</a>, $9.99 </p>

<p><b><u>AMRYL ENTERTAINMENT</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850690354">Cavewoman Kabbits Club #1 (One Shot)(Cover A Devon Massey)</a>, $3.99 <br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850689439">Cavewoman Kabbits Club #1 (One Shot)(Cover B Devon Massey Special Edition Partial Variant)</a>, AR<br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850690379">Cavewoman Kabbits Club #1 (One Shot)(Cover G Fabio Andeson)</a>, AR</p>

<p><b><u>ANTARCTIC PRESS</u></b><br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850690371">Jungle Comics #1 (Cover A Kelsey Shannon)</a>, $3.99 <br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850690370">Jungle Comics #1 (Cover B Dave Dorman)</a>, $34.99 <br />
<a href="https://www.shareasale.com/m-pr.cfm?merchantID=8908&amp;userID=167587&amp;productID=850690369">Jungle Comics #1 (Cover C Brian Denham)</a>, $9.99 </p>

<p><b><u>ARCANA STUDIO</u></b><br />
<a href="http://www.shareasale.com/r.cfm?u=167587&amp;b=84187&amp;m=8908&amp;afftrack=special1&amp;urllink=www.tfaw.com/Graphic+Novels/Profile/Ralph%2BFilmore%2BRevised%2BHC%2BGN___595309%3Fqt%3Dssnrp20190506">Ralph Filmore Paranormal Investigator Revised HC</a>, $19.95</p>

									<div class="post-categories">Categories: <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/ShippingThisWeek/" title="Browse category">Comics Shipping This Week</a>, <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/ComicLists/" title="Browse category">ComicLists</a></div><div class="post-tags">Tags: <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/comiclists:">comiclists</a>, <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/ncrl:">ncrl</a>, <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/shipping+this+week:">shipping this week</a></div><a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/lists/comiclist-new-comic-book-releases-list-for-05-08-2019" title="Permalink">Permalink</a> 									| <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/subscribe/how_to_subscribe" rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml">Subscribe</a>

				<div class="acronyms">
					<h3>The Acronyms List</h3>
					<dl class="closed">
						<dt>AR -</dt><dd>Ask retailer for price</dd>
						<dt>BD -</dt><dd>Blu-ray Disc</dd>
						<dt>CCG -</dt><dd>Collectible card game</dd>
						<dt>CD -</dt><dd>Compact disc</dd>
						<dt>DVD -</dt><dd>Digital versatile disc</dd>
						<dt>FCBD -</dt><dd>Free Comic Book Day</dd>
						<dt>GN -</dt><dd>Graphic novel</dd>
						<dt>HC -</dt><dd>Hardcover</dd>
						<dt>HD -</dt><dd>High definition</dd>
						<dt>LCG -</dt><dd>Living Card Game</dd>
						<dt>MMPB -</dt><dd>Mass market paperback</dd>
						<dt>PVC -</dt><dd>Polyvinyl chloride</dd>
						<dt>RPG -</dt><dd>Role playing game</dd>
						<dt>SC -</dt><dd>Softcover</dd>
						<dt>TBD -</dt><dd>To be determined</dd>
						<dt>TCG -</dt><dd>Trading card game</dd>
						<dt>TP -</dt><dd>Trade paperback</dd>
						<dt>UDA -</dt><dd>Upper Deck Authenticated</dd>
						<dt>WDCC -</dt><dd>Walt Disney Classics Collection</dd>
						<dt>WS -</dt><dd>Widescreen</dd>
					</dl>
					<p class="show-more closed"><a href="javascript:" data-href="#">show more <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span></a></p>
				</div>
				<div class="about">
					<h3>About ComicList</h3>
					<div class="wrap">
						<p>ComicList was founded Jan. 12, 1995 with the mission of empowering comic book consumers by providing accurate and timely information. By delivering the weekly list of new releases, along with news concerning current and future products available in local and online comic book shops, we enable consumers to meet their goals more effectively.</p>
						<p>The new releases list, which details the comic books, graphic novels, trade paperbacks, and other products you will find in your local and online comic book shops, is posted weekly every Monday night. Our site also offers the latest news, previews, and reviews, updated every day.</p>
						<p>Receive ComicList updates via <a href="http://www.comiclist.com/index.php/subscribe/how_to_subscribe">email or RSS feeds</a>, and follow us on <a href="https://twitter.com/ComicList">Twitter</a> and <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/ComicList/6269593037">Facebook</a>.  You can also find us as Agent ComicList in <a href="https://apps.facebook.com/avengersalliance/">Avengers Alliance</a> and Squire Valiant Snail in <a href="https://www.heroup.com/new-visitor/">Super Hero Squad Online</a>.</p>
						<p>Editor In Chief: Charles LePage</p>
						<p>Reviewer In Chief: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/brandon.borzelli">Brandon Borzelli</a></p>
						<p>Web Designer: <a href="http://www.artjohnny.com/">John Chanthana</a></p>
						<p>Graphics Designer: Emilio Amaral Marques de Morais</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><!-- /aside -->
		</div><!-- /col-sm-4 -->
	</div><!-- /row -->
</div><!-- /container -->
